Tap here to add at a theme!: Khumba laha ku ri u engetela nhlokomhaka!

You can choose a start date and end date: U nga hlawula siku ra ku sungula na siku ro heta ra nhlokomhaka leyi

See the activity details here. You're al: Vona vuxokoxoko bya migingiriko laha. Hinkwerhu mihetile ku engetela nhlokomhaka!
If you don't want to use a theme, you ca: Loko u nga lavi ku tirhisa nhlokomhaka. Hinkwerhu mihetile ku engetela nhlokomhaka!
Great! Now the activity is selected. Whe: Swikahle! Sweswi gingiriko wu hlawuriwile. Loko u lava ku dyondza swotala hi gingiriko, u nga khumba mfungho lowu.
